front.title: Static Context Header Compression (SCHC) for the Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMPv6)

abstract.t: This document describes how the ICMPv6 protocol can be integrated into the SCHC architecture. It extends the YANG Data Model described in [RFC9363] with new field IDs specific to ICMPv6 headers as defined in [RFC4443]. To enhance the compression of ICMPv6 error messages, the document also introduces two new Matching Operators and two new Compression Decompression Actions to manipulate the ICMPv6 payload. Finally, for constrained networks such as LPWAN, it introduces a proxy behavior, where a SCHC Core end-point may anticipate the device reaction to incorrect messages.
